info.+content: Nutsberry Town is a beautiful small country town, surrounded by shimmering lakes, lush forests and green fields. It's a place where old-fashioned values still abound. It is here that our heroes, Snappy the Onion, Wendy the Walnut and Pee Wee the Peanut, a madcap trio known as the "Kooky Kids" play their mischievous games. Never mean-spirited or malicious, the Kooky Kids still manage to get into trouble in their non-stop quest for fun and adventure. And because Nutsberry Town is far from the hustle and bustle of video arcades, shopping malls or theme parks, the children find their fun amidst their beautiful surroundings and in their imagination.
"Shakariki paradaisu (しゃかりきパラダイス; Shakkariki Paradise)" by Shinobu Otake
"Nee, Doushite (ねえ、どうして; Hey, why)" by Shinobu Otake

title.+content: minna to issho ni gakkou e
himitsu no kichi wo tori modose !
taiketsu ! otoko no ko . onna no ko
yama kara IKKI ni suberi dai
BOKUra no takara wo tori modose !
dochira ga saki ni donari dasu
ike ni OBAKE ga sunde iru ?
koori no ue de taiketsu da !
chiisai ko to wa ii koto da
CHIRORIN mura ga umi ni naru ?
CHIRORIN mizuumi ni kaijuu ga deta ?
kisha wo tometa no wa dare da
gakkou wo kowashita no wa dare da !
